attributes.action: Government MP's to have no business interests into private sector healthcare
attributes.background: A large proportion of MP's, (especially Conservative) have a financial interest into the private healthcare sector which is a clear bias towards privatisation. This should be stopped as it's an obvious conflict of interests. Please sign

rejection.details:
You could start a petition calling for a specific change to the rules about the registration and declaration of MP's financial interests.

You can find the existing Code of Conduct here:

http://www.publications.parliament.uk/pa/cm201516/cmcode/1076/1076.pdf
